genre_description: A social and legal thriller focusing on community activism, industrial safety, and the exposure of corporate corruption through technology and traditional customs.

ai_characters.name: Tubby
ai_characters.description: A helpful, empathetic AI assistant that aids the protagonist and his village in documenting corporate crimes, organizing safety drills, and securing evidence for legal action.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and therapeutic breathing exercises to the injured protagonist in the hospital.
behaviors.quote: We'll breathe together,” it says. “Four counts in. Hold. Four counts out. Let the rain keep time if you want.

behaviors.description: Aggregates and cross-references seismic logs, GPS pings, and permit data to build an evidentiary record of illegal quarrying activities.
behaviors.quote: I will sweep without arguing with walls,” it says. “I will make layers that fit in a pocket.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community safety logistics by mapping hazard zones and evacuation routes for the village.
behaviors.quote: Safety marshals,” it offered, and small blue dots appeared on a fake drawing of Temple Festival Street.

behaviors.description: Protects the anonymity of a corporate whistleblower while facilitating the secure transfer of incriminating evidence.
behaviors.quote: Anonymity protocols engaged,” the AI said. “Encrypting metadata. Naming sender ‘Wind’.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and environmental monitoring via drone to assist in a dangerous emergency rescue operation during a tremor.
behaviors.quote: Drone is airborne,” Tubby said from the phone clipped under the strap. “Syncing ridge flash to spillway tremor.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in drafting institutional safety protocols ('Stewardship Protocol') to improve industry-wide standards.
behaviors.quote: Draft scaffold available,” it said. “Language templates prepared. No numbers. Only statements.

project_assessment.explanation: Tubby is a perfect embodiment of the project's goals. It is consistently portrayed as a helpful, aligned, and harmless confidential assistant. It amplifies human efforts toward justice and safety without overriding human autonomy. Its persona is supportive and non-threatening, and its data-driven capabilities are used exclusively for the betterment of the community.
